channel.title: Dying in wildy and wildy timers
channel.description: whenever i kill someone pking and i kill them, THEY get pk points, and when they kill me I get pk points. where do i go to change that? ALSO the pk timer on my hybrid pvp source, where can i go to take that off, i don't want it [PI] rep++
